channel.title: Question about admins/mods
channel.description:
K, i made a private server, but when i try change my rights to 3 i log in and log out my rights are 0 again... is there anyway to make the rights stay, i save when i close it but it still goes to 0... i want to be a mod of my own server lol. BTW i'm using testscape source :confused:
someone help me please...
also what is client.java, there are 2 icons that say client, which one is the .java? sorry for being a fricken fr00b

item.title: Question about admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

if you still cant see your crown don’t worry other people will be able to see it…if your really bugging out search for crown fixup and there should be a tut on it if not then go to tutorial section and find the tutorial list it should be pinned ok now find owners can see there own crown or crown fixu up

Read full topic

item.title: Question about admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @superbum1 superbum1
item.description:
@superbum1 wrote:

umm client.java is the one that u can open…
and uhhh to change rights sometimes u have to compile if u dont know what that is then tell me

Read full topic

item.title: Question about admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @drugofanewage drugofanewage
item.description:
@drugofanewage wrote:

after you open client.java press crtl+f and search //start of moderator/

then change admin to whatever name you want… or add a new line

then just click file > save and that should be it

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xvikeax xvikeax
item.description:
@xvikeax wrote:

k thanks i’ll take a look[br][size=1]Posted at: July 10, 2006, 02:55:14 AM[/size][hr]hey do you know if its towards the middle, top, or end, lol that’s a hell of a lot of scrolling[br][size=1]Posted at: July 10, 2006, 02:59:54 AM[/size][hr]hey evil do u think u could get on msn so i can talk to u plz im iiipennywise@Yahoo.com plz talk to me[br][size=1]Posted at: July 10, 2006, 03:20:47 AM[/size][hr]i found it, i saved, but it wont f’ing save, i looked for it for like 2 hours just to find that it doesn’t save. omfg wtf?
